title: What is the Vienna tennis schedule?
description: The action at the Erste Bank Open continues Tuesday in Vienna, where Alex de Minaur will continue his push for a debut appearance at the Nitto ATP Finals. Among the other players in action will be Dominic Thiem, who is competing in his final tournament this week. The Austrian faces Luciano Darderi. View the full Tuesday order of play below to see who is competing, on which court, and when they are scheduled. [ATP APP] ORDER OF PLAY - TUESDAY, 22 OCTOBER 2024 Center Court - start 2 p.m. Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) vs [2] Alex de Minaur (AUS) [5] Frances Tiafoe (USA) vs Cameron Norrie (GBR) Not Before 6 p.m. [WC] Dominic Thiem (AUT) vs Luciano Darderi (ITA) [WC] Kei Nishikori (JPN) vs [7] Jack Draper (GBR) #Glaubandich - start 12 p.m. Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB) vs Mariano Navone (ARG) Not Before 2 p.m. Alex Michelsen (USA) vs Marcos Giron (USA) [Q] Quentin Halys (FRA) vs Gael Monfils (FRA) Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) vs [6] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) Not Before 5 p.m. [WC] Robin Haase (NED) / Alexander Zverev (GER) vs [2] Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Matthew Ebden (AUS) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

html:
Vienna

Learn who is in action at the ATP 500 event

October 21, 2024

Thomas Kronsteiner/Getty Images

The Erste Bank Open will be held from 21-27 October. By ATP Staff

The action at the Erste Bank Open continues Tuesday in Vienna, where Alex de Minaur will continue his push for a debut appearance at the Nitto ATP Finals.

Among the other players in action will be Dominic Thiem, who is competing in his final tournament this week. The Austrian faces Luciano Darderi.

View the full Tuesday order of play below to see who is competing, on which court, and when they are scheduled.

ORDER OF PLAY - TUESDAY, 22 OCTOBER 2024

Center Court - start 2 p.m.
Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) vs [2] Alex de Minaur (AUS)
[5] Frances Tiafoe (USA) vs Cameron Norrie (GBR)

Not Before 6 p.m.
[WC] Dominic Thiem (AUT) vs Luciano Darderi (ITA)
[WC] Kei Nishikori (JPN) vs [7] Jack Draper (GBR)

#Glaubandich - start 12 p.m.
Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB) vs Mariano Navone (ARG)

Not Before 2 p.m.
Alex Michelsen (USA) vs Marcos Giron (USA)
[Q] Quentin Halys (FRA) vs Gael Monfils (FRA)
Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) vs [6] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA)

Not Before 5 p.m.
[WC] Robin Haase (NED) / Alexander Zverev (GER) vs [2] Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Matthew Ebden (AUS)
